title: Issues with obtaining key fragments
body: So it's been two weeks since I've gotten a single key fragment in League and I'm seriously wondering if something is wrong with my client or if I'm not getting them for an actual reason. I've played dozens of games during this time frame and have not gotten a single key fragment the entire time so I've just been sitting here with 5 crates that I can't do anything with and I'm pretty annoyed by it at this point. I checked around and saw that sometimes you can have penalties placed on your rate of obtaining key fragments, but if I've been subjected to one of these penalties I don't know it. If anyone can help me somehow that'd be great.

replies.body:
> The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

Thanks for the info and link, but is it normal for them to not drop at all during such a long time frame? I mean two weeks without a single fragment seems kinda odd since I don't think I've experienced a drought like this before in all my play time.

The chance of getting a key fragment gets exponentially more difficult after each one you get. You aren't guaranteed to get one even if you played something like 100 matches in a week. As *ZombieMaster* mentioned, your droprate will eventually reset and you should see them again.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Are you sure about that? I'm pretty sure riot socrates confirmed on reddit (and possibly elsewhere) that their are protections in place so people can't get *too* unlucky i.e. after enough wins without a fragment drop you'd be guaranteed one.

You can only get a total of 16 key fragments (So they said ; proven ; no ; fact: 12 is the actual number from my experience) per month, after the month resets you can start earning keys again, its really hard to earn the last bit of keys.
